title: How do you check Honor Exp
body: I was Just wondering how to check how close you are to leveling up to the next honor lvl, if anybody  knew it would help alot.

replies.body: There is no way to check it or level up. I have been getting at least 2 honors every game (solo) for about 10 games. Did not level up. But 2 reports on me from some kids and riot drops my honor level. This is how this system works. IT DOES NOT.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
At the moment you can't see your current Honor exp towards the next level. It's a feature that might be implemented sometime in the future though!

Hum, what...? Simurgh in the thread over there https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/l3xTFQnI-lets-chat-about-honor?show=rundown very pointedly said that they would NOT implement this feature, and explained why.
